Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.mapper

Interface UserMapper

public interface UserMapper
Mapper interface for converting between User-related DTOs, entities, and events.

This interface defines the mappings from UserCreateDto to UserEntity, from UserEntity to UserInfoDto, and from UserEntity to UserDataEvent. MapStruct automatically generates the implementation for these conversions.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    toUserDataEvent(UserEntity userEntity)
    Converts a UserEntity to a UserDataEvent.

  • Method Details

    • toUserEntity

      UserEntity toUserEntity(UserCreateDto user, String userId)
      Converts a UserCreateDto to a UserEntity.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserCreateDto to be mapped
      userId - the user ID to associate with the entity
      Returns:
      the mapped UserEntity

    • toUserInfoDto

      UserInfoDto toUserInfoDto(UserEntity user, boolean isFriend)
      Converts a UserEntity to a UserInfoDto.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserEntity to be mapped
      isFriend - boolean indicating whether the requesting user is a friend or not
      Returns:
      the mapped UserInfoDto

    • toUserDataEvent

      UserDataEvent toUserDataEvent(UserEntity userEntity)
      Converts a UserEntity to a UserDataEvent.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
